_header: Our gold and silver is no common plate
_description: Introductory lines for an alchemical text, preceding 5095 in one manuscript—three couplets

BodAsh759.Transcription:
Our gold and our siluer is no comen plateBut a sperme out of a body
                    takeWheryn is all sol lune and lightWater and erth fyre and
                    frightAnd all comyth out of on ymageBut water of wode maketh the
                    mariage
